articles.author: By Bob Berwyn
articles.title: Paris Agreement target won’t protect polar ice sheets, scientists warn - Ars Technica
articles.description: New research suggests the Earth will pass multiple dangerous tipping points at 1.5 degrees Celsius of warming, the U.N. limit exceeded for much of the last two years.
articles.content: Sea levels in some parts of the world could be rising by as much as 8 to 12 inches per decade within the lifetime of todays youngest generations, outpacing the ability of many coastal communities to … [+9914 chars]

articles.author: Bob Pockrass
articles.title: Team Penske releases three top executives following Indy 500 qualifying violations - FOX Sports
articles.description: In the wake of the team’s second major technical violation in two years, Roger Penske announced the departure of three of its main INDYCAR race team executives ahead of the Indy 500.
articles.content: In the wake of the teams second major technical violation in two years, Roger Penske announced the departure of three of its main INDYCAR race team executives, including longtime executive Tim Cindri… [+3729 chars]
